trans-unit.source: Provides functionality to create new classes from values in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能，以建立新的類別中的值從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property is set to an expression that contains the `new` function, a class is dynamically created that contains only the properties specified in the `new` function.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性設定為包含的運算式`new`函式，以動態方式建立類別，其中包含中指定的屬性`new`函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parser creates the `new` class by extending the DynamicClass class.
trans-unit.target: 剖析器建立`new`延伸 DynamicClass 類別的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Query.Dynamic.DynamicClass"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Query.Dynamic.DynamicClass"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the dynamic class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串表示動態類別。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property is set to an expression that contains the `new` function, a class is dynamically created that contains only the properties specified in the `new` function.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>屬性設定為包含的運算式`new`函式，以動態方式建立類別，其中包含中指定的屬性`new`函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parser creates the `new` class by extending the <xref:System.Web.Query.Dynamic.DynamicClass> class.
trans-unit.target: 剖析器建立`new`類別藉由擴充<xref:System.Web.Query.Dynamic.DynamicClass>類別。</xref:System.Web.Query.Dynamic.DynamicClass>

trans-unit.source: The ToString methods creates a string representation of the properties in the class.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法的類別中建立屬性的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the dynamic class and its properties.
trans-unit.target: 表示動態類別和其屬性的字串。
